content.title: Add a Static Expression
content.body:
1. From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Label-lblLine and right-click on text{string}and select Add Expression.
  2. In the box that appears, add the following expression:
    ""
    Click anywhere outside the box to close it.
  3. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under the Network section, select Loading Indicator.
  4. From the right pane of the Action Editor, for Loading Indicator, select Dismiss.
  5. Click Save.
